meanings.definition: (adjective) Of an animal's head: shown face-on with no neck visible.
meanings.sent1: The painting displayed a caboshed deer with its full face visible.
meanings.sent2: The artist drew the caboshed lion with its face directly facing the viewer.
meanings.sent3: The caboshed horse in the picture seemed to be posing for a portrait.
meanings.sent4: The caboshed eagle on the flag symbolized strength and courage.
meanings.sent5: The caboshed bear in the logo looked both fierce and friendly.
